channel.title: Gardner, Martin on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gardner, Martin on Chege's Blog

item.title: CS 81n: Hackers and Heroes
item.description: Recreational Programming with Hackers : Ch 1: The Tech Model Railroad Club Ch 2: The Hacker Ethic Ch 3: Spacewar Ch 4: Greenblatt and Gosper Ch 5: The Midnight Computer Wiring Society Ch 6: Winners and Losers Ch 7: Life The Last of the True Hackers Margaret Hamilton, the Engineer Who Took the Apollo to the Moon Rise of Worse Is Better The Inner Ring In the Beginning was the Command Line Mathematical Games - The fantastic combinations of John Conway’s new solitaire game ‘life’ Conway’s Game of Life - Wikipedia Interviewing Principles An Insider’s View of ‘Ciscogate’ More Tales From ‘Ciscogate’ What is Engineering?
